'''Belinda Garcia''' is a woman whose house caught on fire.

==History==
Belinda was asleep in her house after seeing her husband off to work when a fire started in their house. When firefighters found her, she was huddled on a bed with two of her children, [[Steven Garcia|Steven]] and [[Erica Garcia|Erica]]. She told the firefighters that her two teenagers were in a room at the other end of the hall.

Outside, Belinda and her children were triaged and given oxygen. While they waited for the fire to be put out, Belinda collapsed from respiratory distress and had to be taken to the hospital.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She is married. Her husband had left for work before a fire started in their house.

===Familial===
She and four generations of her family decided to quarantine in one house together during the [[COVID-19 Pandemic]].

==Notes and Trivia==
*She was 37 at the time of the fire.
